text: The National Volleyball Association (NVA) is a men's professional volleyball league in America composed of 10 teams. NVA is an active member of USA Volleyball (Teamusa) which is recognized by FIVB (also known as the International Volleyball Federation) as the national governing body for volleyball in the United States.Professional menâ€™s volleyball league in USA == References == Category:Sports in the United States Category:Volleyball organizations Category:Sports leagues
title: National Volleyball Association
